1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Hot Pink Shorts: The Making Of (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Meet Gina Daggett, columnist, writer, producer and first time filmmaker. Gina doesn't have the experience but she certainly has the ideas and the enthusiasm to make her project 'Til Death Do Us Toby' a smashing success.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Hot Pink Shorts: The Making Of (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Kevin Kostal is a film school student with a passion for everything film related. What Kevin lacks in confidence he makes up for with his keen style and vision. Two things that make his first short film Short Sight, a fantastic achievement.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Hot Pink Shorts: The Making Of (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: Meet Melissa Sky, founder of femme fatale productions in Waterloo, Ontario. Melissa is a born writer and her understanding of story is a valuable asset on her journey to creating her first narrative piece, 'The Princes Sword.'

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Hot Pink Shorts: The Making Of (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: Steven Bereznai will be the first to admit he knows close to nothing about filmmaking. But his organizational skills and his eagerness to learn come in handy as he attempts to pull of his first short film, 'Let's Get Soaking Wet.'

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Hot Pink Shorts: The Making Of (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: Meet Sean Horlor and Steve Adams. Together they make a filmmaking dream team on a mission to complete there first short film, 'Just the Tip.'

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Hot Pink Shorts: The Making Of (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: Meet David C. Jones, actor, writer, director, producer and go-getter. David is a true example of determination as he does whatever it takes to complete his film 'The Bonus.'
